data.text: @RamnishJ Mr Jaiswal, we regret the inconvenience. Could you please share your PNR via DM so we may check and look into it? We will get back to you.~Vaishali
@Build_Faire Hi, please share your PNR via DM so we may check and advise.~Vaishali
@Pritira26276432 Ma'am, we request you to share the concern in more detail via DM so we may look into it and share it forward for review. Thanks.~Vaishali
@gstyles_m Hi, a helmet can not be carried as cabin baggage but you can carry it as check-in baggage. ~Vaishali
@AndhareTanu Hi, we're concerned to know this. Could you please share your PNR via DM so we may look into it?~Vaishali
@SanitTater Sir, we sincerely regret the damage. Could you pease share your PNR via DM so we may check and advise.~Vaishali

@Clyvin Sir, we understand how discomforting it would have been knowing the AC wasn't that effective. While we share your feedback internally, hope the temperature got better soon after the flight took off. Also,, please share the PNR via DM.~Vaishali
@itsyourboisoul Hi, yes it is allowed in the check-in bag.~Vaishali
@parvez82416159 Sir, we're concerned to note your disappointment. Our crew is expected to be courteous all the time. Please allow us some time to get it checked. We will update you.~Vaishali

@ankitijk @DGCAIndia Sir, we regret the inconvenience and we can understand how someone will feel in the same situation. Please share your PNR via DM so we may raise it with the concerned team for review and rectification.~Vaishali
@imsumitdatta Sir, we can totally understand your concern and regret about the change in schedule. Also, your feedback is duly noted. We wish to serve you better in the future.~Vaishali

@vichoudhary Sir, we're sad to know about the delay in your flight schedule. As checked the flight was impacted because of operational reasons. The flight is departed now. Further, we have noted your feedback. ~Vaishali
@mohitthakrani Sir, we can totally understand your concern. We will get this checked. Please bear with us in the interim.~Vaishali

@ankitijk @DGCAIndia Sir, we're sad to know about the delay in your flight schedule. As checked the flight was impacted because of operational reasons. The flight will depart any moment soon. Further, we have noted your feedback. ~Vaishali
@ManashPattnaik_ Further, please share your PNR and we shall share your feedback with the concerned team for necessary review. ~Vaishali (2/2)
@ManashPattnaik_ Hi, we do understand your concern as delays are equally painful for us. It is only under extreme uncontrollable situation we're compelled to make such changes in the schedule. (1/2)
@mohitthakrani Sir, we regret the delay. Please allow us some time to get it checked. We will get back to you.~Vaishali
@rakeshmishra7 Sir, we regret the inconvenience. Please share your PNR via DM so we may check and advise.~Vaishali
@Vamce Hi, we sincerely regret seeing the damage. Please share your PNR via DM so we may check and look into it. Meanwhile, please contact our airport staff for real-time assistance.~Vaishali
@ks40117 Hi, please share your concern in more detail via DM along with the PNR so we may assist.~Vaishali
@akshay_m21 Sir, we regret the inconvenience. Please share your PNR via DM so we may check and advise.~Vaishali
@MahendraDate1 Hi, we're concerned to know this. Please share the PNR via DM so we may connect. Or please get in contact with your airport team for real-time assistance.~Vaishali

@imsumitdatta Sir, we're sad to know about the delay in your flight schedule. As checked the flight was impacted because of operational reasons. The flight is departed now. Further, we have noted your feedback. ~Vaishali
@sucheta_luther Hi, thank you for the shoutout. We're glad to hear that our staff assisted you well. We'll definitely pass it along, please share the PNR.~Vaishali #goIndiGo
@HariniVenkate19 Hi, please know that alcohol bottles are allowed only in the check-in bag. Thanks.~Vaishali
@_supratim Hi, thank you for your kind words. This means a lot to us. We're glad to hear that our staff assisted you well. We'll definitely pass it along, please share the PNR. #goIndiGo

@its_Mayank91 Sir, please know that under saver fare there are charges only for advance seat selection. If you do not have a seat preference, you may opt for an auto-seat assignment up to 6 hours prior to the departure which is free of cost.~Vaishali
@dalkeanurag Sir, we've replied to you via DM. You may check.~Vaishali
@meetdk Sir, we regret the inconvenience. Please share your PNR via DM so we may raise it with the concerned team for review and expedite the process.~Vaishali
@Chans2k2 Mr Sharma, we're concerned about it and regret the inconvenience. Your feedback is noted and we will raise it with the concerned team for review and rectification.~Vaishali

@jeetarora4u Sir, we're sad to know about the delay in your flight schedule. As checked the flight was impacted consequentially because of the late arrival of incoming aircraft. The flight will be airborne any moment soon. Further, we have noted your feedback. ~Vaishali
@VishalD1980 Sir, we regret the inconvenience. Please share your PNR via DM so we may raise it with the concerned team for review and rectification.~Vaishali
@dalkeanurag Sir, we regret the inconvenience and concerned to know this. Please share the PNR via DM so we may check and look into it.~Vaishali

@GirishAgrwl1412 Mr Agrawal, we never wish to cause hassle to our customers. However, we sincerely regret the experience this time. Further, we have noted your feedback and hope to serve you better in the future.~Vaishali

@vivek0281 Hi, we regret the delay in your flight schedule. As checked the flight was impacted consequentially because of the late arrival of incoming aircraft. The flight will be airborne soon. Further, we have noted your feedback. ~Vaishali

@JasveerSandhu_ Sir, we're sad to know about the delay in your flight schedule. As checked the flight was impacted consequentially because of the late arrival of incoming aircraft. The flight will be airborne soon. Further, we have noted your feedback. ~Vaishali
@sheldoncoelho Hi, thank you for the shoutout. We're glad to hear that our staff assisted you well. We'll definitely pass it along, please share the PNR.~Vaishali#goIndiGo
@Punekar79 Further, an alternate option was provided at minimal fares. We hope for your understanding in this regard.~Vaishali (2/2)

@Punekar79 Hi, we sincerely regret the inconvenience. Please be informed that the check-in counter closes 60 minutes prior to the departure, however, as you reported 24 minutes prior to departure was the only reason that staff couldn't accept her on that flight. (1/2)
@AnoopCampbell Sir, please share the PNR via DM so we can check and assist with the same. Thanks. ~Ojasvi

@GirishAgrwl1412 Mr Agrawal, we regret the inconvenience caused. As checked, the delay was due to the late arrival of incoming aircraft and we believe the flight will be airborne any minute now. Further, your feedback is duly noted. ~Ojasvi
@KishukGoyal Sir, please DM your PIR copy issued by the arrival staff via DM so we can check and assist. Thanks. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@dgaurav7 Sir, we do try to accommodate local language-speaking crew on all regional flights as far as possible. Exceptions occur when crew flight routes clash. Your feedback though is duly noted and appreciated. ~Ojasvi

@murtuza012 We regret to know about your experience. As checked, you were carrying a damaged passport, hence denied by the immigration team, due to which our staff was unable to accept you on the same flight. We look forward to your understanding. ~Shreya
@vijaysvn We believe you have collected the same. Thanks! ~Shreya
@AasifAbdullah Sir, please share your PNR along with the copy of the PIR issued by the arrival staff via DM so we can check and assist. Thanks. ~Ojasvi
@EPavan641 Sir, we're sorry to know about the loss. Please accept our deepest condolences. He may carry the Urn with ashes in the hand baggage. ~Ojasvi
@Skkit_Twt Hi, you may carry deodorant in check-in baggage and a trimmer in hand baggage. ~Ojasvi

domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Beauty, Cosmetic & Personal Care Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to makeup, perfumes and skin care

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical
domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

domain.name: Product Taxonomy
domain.description: A product taxonomy for labeling categories of products.

data.text: @fattallcurly Hi, we wish to inform you, to avail free seats, you may opt for auto-seat assignment during web check-in and the seat will be assigned to you as per the availability. ~Ojasvi

@MRVChennai Sir, we regret the inconvenience caused. It's never our intention to disrupt the plans of our passengers. The delay was due to the late arrival of incoming aircraft and we believe the flight will be airborne any minute now. Your feedback is extremely valuable to us. ~Ojasvi
@vijaysvn Hi, please share your PNR via DM so we can share this with the concerned team ASAP. ~Ojasvi
@chillsugata Mr Roy, we regret the inconvenience caused. We are raising this with the concerned team right away and will get back to you with an update ASAP. ~Ojasvi
@karthi050389 Sir, we never wish to disrupt the plans of our passengers. The delay was due to the late arrival of incoming aircraft. We believe the flight will be airborne any minute now. ~Ojasvi
@shamik9 @triptoes Mr Podder, we regret the experience you had. Could you please DM the PNR so we may check? ~Shreya

@Atul_K_Shah Sir, we are concerned to see this. Please confirm if the same was reported to the arrival team. Further, we request you to share your PNR via DM so we can highlight this with the concerned team. ~Ojasvi
@RadheshwarP Please share your PNR along with your Contact Number and an image of your ID Proof, so we may check on the same and advise. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@himansh61869195 Mr Gautam, we'd like to look into this and request you to DM us your concern in detail, along with your PNR. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@Prolaysarkar Hi, we are concerned to know this and request you to DM us your PNR, so we may share the same with our concerned Airport Team for further review and process rectification. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@akshay_m21 Hi Akshay, we regret the inconvenience and have noted your feedback. Wishing you a comfortable time in the skies. ~Navi
@prateekm92 Hi Prateek, please share your PNR via DM so we may assist you with the same. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@HiteshT21309785 Mr Thakkar, we request you to get in touch with our Airport Team for real-time assistance, as soon as you reach the Airport. Thanks. ~Navi
@iJsaraff Mr Saraff, we'd like to look into this and request you to share your PNR via DM, so we may check on the same and assist. Thanks. ~Navi

@LahiriTapapriya Ms Lahiri, we regret the experience and as checked, 6E 2517 is delayed due to Operational Reasons and is expected to depart at 2225 hrs. Our Airport Team is there to assist the customers and you may get in touch with them for any real-time assistance. Thanks. ~Navi
@Anir4Newindia Hi Anirudh, we are here to assist and request you to DM us your PNR, so we may check on the same. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@goutham292003 Thanks for taking out the time to speak with us. As discussed, we have cancelled the PNR : XRPSQT and you may contact your Travel Agency after 48 hrs to claim the refund. Refund status can be checked at https://t.co/UHMZsLAMMS. ~Navi

urls.title: Track Refund status for your booking online - IndiGo
urls.description: Check Refund Status - Now track your refund in easy steps online. Know your refund status for flight booking and track online at goIndiGo.in website.

data.text: @NavneetDuggal2 Mr Duggal, we regret the experience you had and request you to DM us your Contact Number, so we may connect with you for further assistance on the same. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@NKRISHN73888567 Mr Krishnakumar, we regret the inconvenience caused. Our flight operations are dependent on several factors, some of which are uncontrollable and may disrupt the schedule. Our Airport Team is there and you may contact them for any real-time assistance. Thanks. ~Navi

@JogiYogika Thanks for the #Shoutout, Mr Awasthi. We take pride in our work and our sincerest hope is that it helps each one of our customers. Your feedback has demonstrated that it does, and we appreciate you letting us know. 💙 #goIndiGo ~Navi
@ravikndri Dr Ravi Kant, under the same PNR, customers can club their check-in luggage. Please be informed that 1 piece of check-in luggage shouldn't exceed 32 kgs in total. Thanks. ~Navi

@RashiBareja Mr Bareja, we regret the experience you had and will surely check on the same with our concerned Airport Team. Your feedback will be shared and we wish you a comfortable time in the skies. ~Navi
@AishiryD Hi, you may cancel/change your flight here: https://t.co/xgObbSkVrJ. If you need further assistance, we are only a DM away. ~Ojasvi

urls.title: Manage Booking: Edit, cancel & reschedule flight - IndiGo
urls.description: Manage your IndiGo flight booking. Select a seat, edit, change, cancel & reschedule your flight. Get your travel itinerary, download ticket or print boarding pass.

data.text: @Yadavabhi30 Hi, please share the PNR via DM so we may look into this further. Thanks. ~Ojasvi
@SalilDobhal Mr Dobhal, we see our Customer Experience Team is in touch with you for the same. Do let us know in case you need more assistance and we wish you a great day. ~Navi
@agrawaltarangks Thanks. Our team tried calling you but the call wasn't connected. Please share an alternate number via DM so we may connect with you again to assist. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@Varaha_93 Hi, you may carry upto 5 litres of alcohol in check-in baggage with proper seal and packing. ~Ojasvi
@Pratapkali1 Let us check. ~Shreya

@artfuldodger098 Sir, we have called you today however, the call went unanswered. Could you please DM us an alternate number or a convenient time to call. ~Shreya
  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@nocturnalnkid Sir, please visit https://t.co/R8FtqI4iJE to create Group Booking.
@AishiryD Hi, please share your PNR via DM so we may check and assist. Thanks. ~Ojasvi
@AlliedRonak Sir,  sadly our team couldn't locate your article. So sorry about this. But we never lose hope. If we ever find it, we'll do give you a shout. ~Shreya
@Arunkaus Sir, we are concerned to see this. Please allow us some time to get this checked and we'll get back to you at the earliest. ~Ojasvi
@Akshita42453226 Hi, we request you to get in touch with our airport team for real-time assistance. ~Ojasvi
@Poohcar12 Hi, please share your contact number via DM and we'll assist you for the same. ~Ojasvi
@Hummerzinger Hi, how may we assist you? ~Ojasvi
@miss_nath_ Ma'am, we can understand your frustration. As checked, the flight is scheduled to depart at 1905 hours. We truly regret the inconvenience caused. ~Ojasvi
@vivifyutkarsh Hi, please visit https://t.co/a6K7huo6KW for information related to the charter flight. ~Ojasvi

urls.title: Charter Flight - Book Passenger & CarGo Charter Plane | IndiGo
urls.description: Enjoy privacy & comfort with IndiGo passenger charter flight to India & international. Also book domestic & international CarGo charter planes with IndiGo.

data.text: @RAJAGOPALAN1951 @CISFHQrs Sir, while we truly regret the hassle this incident brought, we're glad that our team was able to assist you. Be assured, your experience has been shared internally as well. We look forward to having you onboard again, soon. ~Shreya
@Pratapkali1 Hi, we are concerned to see this. Please share the PNR via DM so we may check and assist. Thanks. ~Ojasvi
@ChattarajMegh Ms Chattaraj, your feedback is well noted and we look forward to serving you in a better way, next time you travel with us. ~Navi
@uddalak1404 We believe our team has contacted and addressed your concern. Thanks! ~Shreya
@AlokCha62493787 We regret the delayed response Mr Chandra. Hoping serve you better in future. ~Diyashi
@nocturnalnkid Sir, you may write to us at groups@goindigo.in. Our team will surely assist you. ~Snigdha
@Adarsh1005 Sir, we regret the delay in response. We're looking into it for  a review. ~Shreya
@Mark_Rodricks Sir, we believe one of our team member got connected and assisted you with the concern. ~Diyashi
@yoganarrives We regret the delayed response. We believe our customer relations team got connected and addressed your concern. ~Diyashi

@ajay_gupta07 Sir, we always want our customers to feel comfortable while travelling with us. We do value your feedback & be assured it will be shared internally. Hope to serve you better in future ~Shreya

data.text: @HariKri99251448 Sir, we believe our team has contacted and confirmed the booking status. Thanks! ~Shreya
@rishabhjohri99 Sir, we request you to please get in touch with the lost and found department of the concerned airport. They will assist you with this. ~Shreya
@mirzanaim Mr Mirza, we’re constantly optimizing our schedule, and we will have your feedback sent to our Route Planning Team. ~Linda
@shafaug10 We always want our customers to feel comfortable while traveling with us. We do value your feedback and have noted it. Hope to serve you better in future ~Shreya
